statements: SELECT * FROM authorized_telecom_operators;
SELECT operator_name, permit_number FROM authorized_telecom_operators ORDER BY operator_name DESC;
SELECT id, operator_name, license_expiry FROM authorized_telecom_operators WHERE permit_number='123ABC';
SELECT * FROM authorized_telecom_operators WHERE license_expiry >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT operator_name, permit_number FROM authorized_telecom_operators ORDER BY permit_number ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM authorized_telecom_operators ORDER BY operator_name DESC;
SELECT id, operator_name, license_expiry FROM authorized_telecom_operators WHERE license_expiry > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM authorized_telecom_operators WHERE operator_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT id, operator_name, permit_number FROM authorized_telecom_operators WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM authorized_telecom_operators WHERE license_expiry < '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM authorized_telecom_operators;
SELECT id, operator_name FROM authorized_telecom_operators WHERE license_number='12345';
SELECT * FROM service_providers ORDER BY provider_name ASC;
SELECT id, permit_number FROM service_providers WHERE provider_name='XYZ Telecom';
SELECT id, provider_name, permit_number FROM service_providers WHERE id='12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT id, operator_name, license_number FROM authorized_telecom_operators WHERE operator_name = 'ABC Telecom';
SELECT * FROM authorized_telecom_operators WHERE license_number LIKE '%123%' ORDER BY operator_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_operators FROM authorized_telecom_operators;
SELECT operator_name, license_number FROM authorized_telecom_operators UNION ALL SELECT provider_name, permit_number FROM service_providers;
SELECT * FROM authorized_telecom_operators WHERE operator_name LIKE '%Telecom%' AND license_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY operator_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM authorized_telecom_operators ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name FROM service_providers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, license_number FROM authorized_telecom_operators WHERE license_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM regulations ORDER BY effective_date DESC;
SELECT id, description FROM regulations WHERE id > 5;
SELECT name, license_number FROM authorized_telecom_operators ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM service_providers WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT id, description FROM regulations WHERE effective_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM authorized_telecom_operators JOIN service_providers ON authorized_telecom_operators.id = service_providers.id;
SELECT * FROM regulations WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM authorized_telecom_operators;
SELECT operator_name, permit_id FROM authorized_telecom_operators WHERE license_expiry IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM authorized_service_providers ORDER BY provider_name ASC;
SELECT provider_name, issue_date FROM authorized_service_providers WHERE permit_id > 100;
SELECT license_id, license_type, valid_from FROM licenses WHERE valid_to <= '2023-12-31';
SELECT * FROM authorized_telecom_operators WHERE operator_name = 'Example Telecom' ORDER BY operator_id DESC;
SELECT provider_name, permit_type FROM authorized_service_providers INNER JOIN permits ON authorized_service_providers.permit_id = permits.permit_id;
SELECT license_type, valid_from FROM licenses WHERE valid_to >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY valid_from ASC;

SELECT provider_name, issue_date FROM authorized_service_providers INNER JOIN permits ON authorized_service_providers.permit_id = permits.permit_id WHERE permit_type LIKE '%Mobile%' ORDER BY issue_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM authorized_telecom_operators WHERE license_expiry IS NOT NULL AND permit_id IN (SELECT permit_id FROM permits WHERE expiry_date > '2023-01-01');
SELECT * FROM authorized_telecom_operators;
SELECT operator_id, operator_name, permit_expiry_date FROM authorized_telecom_operators WHERE operator_id = 1;
SELECT provider_name FROM service_providers ORDER BY provider_name ASC;
SELECT permit_number FROM permits WHERE issue_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM provider_services WHERE service_type LIKE '%voice%'
SELECT * FROM authorized_telecom_operators
SELECT * FROM service_providers ORDER BY provider_name DESC
SELECT operator_id, operator_name FROM authorized_telecom_operators WHERE permit_expiry_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT provider_name, registration_number FROM service_providers WHERE provider_id IN (SELECT provider_id FROM provider_services WHERE service_type = 'Internet')
SELECT operator_name, permit_expiry_date FROM authorized_telecom_operators JOIN permits ON authorized_telecom_operators.permit_number = permits.permit_number
